text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and on this

baking soda Nutella unsalted butter at
room temperature
brown sugar regular granulated sugar an
egg and vanilla extract that's it so
let's get right into it the first thing
you want to do is get your oven
preheated to 375 the second thing you
wanna do is take a baking sheet lined

right into it now I already have all my

I'm just going to mix them to combine
that looks good so now in this bowl I'm

of sugar and I'm just going to take my
electric mixer here and cream these
together awesome so now we're going to
add in the Nutella which is one of the

delicious things ever put that in there
along with something like that along
with the egg there's a touch of vanilla
extract
and then just cream this until it's all
nice and creamy and walk and bind okay
let's add in our dry ingredients and
incorporate them okay okay just take

to mix everything in to make sure that
there's nothing left behind okay that
looks good I'm going to use my little
handy dandy ice cream scoop and I'm

any moment
so these are going to go into your

they will puff up as they bake but as

and show you what they look like once

10 minutes and I've let them cool
completely and like I said when they
bake and they come out of the oven
they're like a puffed up but as they
cool they flatten just like that and
they're really nice and chewy they're
not like a hard crispy cookie it's got a
